overview: Recorded on 06/22/19 at Val de Moine, Clisson, France  Once Upon Atrocity Thirteen Autumns and a Widow Cruelty Brought Thee Orchids Beneath the Howling Stars Malice Through the Looking Glass Heartbreak and Seance Summer Dying Fast Nymphetamine (Fix) Saffron's Curse Her Ghost in the Fog
